biotools.summary: Genin2 is a lightining-fast bioinformatic tool to predict genotypes for clade 2.3.4.4b H5Nx viruses collected in Europe since October 2020. Genin2 identifies only epidemiologically relevant European genotypes, i.e., detected in at least 3 viruses collected from at least 2 countries.
